title: How to cite a poem in TextMLA - Quora

response.answer_text: MLA Formatting Quotations // Purdue Writing Lab owl Purdue citing poetry mla And just a few things that students tend to miss… Use a / to divide lines of poetry.If quoting a section of more than 4 lines, use a hanging indention.Use line numbers at the end of the sentence. Ex. Poe describes the croaking repitition “Nevermore" (4).Still include a Works Cited page if you are using a different source from a text or handout that your instructor is using.Bookmark the Purdue Writing Lab for quick reference for EVERYTHING to do with writing. It's my favorite site (no compensation here). 😎
